name: Hedgehog Burrow
description:
Hedgehog Burrow

Build your own hedgehog burrow to help the little guys survive the winter!

Your goal in this game is to have as many hedgehogs as you can after 96 days.

To archive this goal you need to take care of food and sleeping needs of your little friends.

Interface Cheatsheet:

To gather resources you can use Expedition button to send a hedgehog on expedition or you can left click on leaves, stick and apples that fall down from tree to pick them up.

Keep track of Temperature meter. It indicates what level of heating is required for your rooms to work.
